Class POSLHandler

java.lang.Object
  POSLHandler

public class POSLHandler
extends java.lang.Object

WellnessRules (Any) PA: This class handles POSL method calls for PA's such as generating POSL profiles parsing a RuleML query, and answering an POSL query with OO jDREW. AGFA Project - WellnessRules Initiative NRC-IIT Fredericton 46 Dineen Drive Fredericton, New Brunswick, E3B 9W4 Canada

Method Detail

answerPOSLQuery

public static void answerPOSLQuery(java.lang.String contents,
                                   java.lang.String message,
                                   java.lang.String address,
                                   java.lang.String port,
                                   java.lang.String messageEndpoint,
                                   MessageParser m)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
Given the message and sending information, will answer the query and send it off to the OA.

Parameters:
contents - The message send by the EA.
message - Another version of the message.
address - The IP of the mule ESB.
port - The port of the OA on the server.
messageEndpoint - The endpoint of the PA.
m - The message parser containing sending information.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - General exception.

getVariableOrder

public static java.lang.String[] getVariableOrder(java.lang.String message)
Is used to remember the order of variables so that the message returned to the OA does not contain randomly ordered data.

Parameters:
message - The RuleML message
Returns:
An array containing the order of the variables.

registerPOSLTypes

                              throws java.lang.Exception
Registers the types from the RDF file located at the provided URL.

Parameters:
rdfAddress - The address of the RDF file.
Throws:

generatePOSLProfiles

public static java.lang.String generatePOSLProfiles(java.lang.String profileSpecified,
                                                    java.lang.String[] responsible,
                                                    java.lang.String globalAddress)
                                             throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
Generates the POSL profiles from the profile specified and the list of responsible profiles.

Parameters:
profileSpecified - The profile specified (if none, all are used)
responsible - The list of profiles that the PA is responsible for
globalAddress - Address of the global knowledge base.
Throws:
java.lang.NumberFormatException
java.io.IOException
